featured.text: Some heroes have been rewarded for their bravery.
The organization encourages consumers to choose brands that take precautions to protect elephants and has set up a certification program to reward tea growers who are doing it right.
One such reward is the Carnegie Medal.
Sometimes heroes are rewarded for their brave acts.
As a reward, the government gave her a house.

definition.en_def: Something given in recognition of service, effort, or achievement.
definition.example: She received a reward for her hard work on the project.
